condition: [AND]([EQ](<*ATTSEL(Exp HS Enter Number of additional Points)*>,1),[GT](<*Eval(<*VALUE(Exp HS Enter Number of additional Points)*>/100 -int(<*VALUE(Exp HS Enter Number of additional Points)*>/100))*>,0))
name: Number of 100 point bundles Calculation Roundup
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(Exp HS Number of 100 point bundles:<*Eval(1+int(<*VALUE(Exp HS Enter Number of additional Points)*>/100))*>)*>
description:
Rule inactivated as part of CXCPQ-43096Applicable only when Run Time NO

Number of 100 point bundles=ROUNDUP(Enter Number of additional Points)/100)

Ex: roundup(21/5)=5
